parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.60

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> If true, units can be in a vehicle with broken tracks/wheels.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicle '''allowCrewInImmobile''' bool

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> bool: [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_vehicle [[allowCrewInImmobile]] [[true]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[canMove]]
</value></part></template>


[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
[[Category:Arma 2: Operation Arrowhead: New Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on April 27, 2015 - 19:52 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Killzone Kid|Killzone Kid]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
This will stop AI disembarking when immobile
<code>KK_fnc_allowCrewInImmobile <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> {
	_this [[allowCrewInImmobile]] true;
	{
		_x [[disableAI]] "FSM";
		_x [[setBehaviour]] "CARELESS";
	} [[forEach]] [[crew]] _this;
};
//example
car [[call]] KK_fnc_allowCrewInImmobile;</code>
</dd>
</dl>
<comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes --></comment></root>
